comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: NYTimes: MARINES ARE ASSEMBLING.; Government Sending a Thousand to Philadelphia to Sail To-day. February 18, 1913, Tuesday Page 2, 251 words PHILADELPHIA, Feb 17. -- To carry more than 1,000 marines to Guantanamo as a measure of precaution, in view of the crisis in Mexico, the transport Meade is on her way hero from Newport News, and is expected to arrive early to-morrow. query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9406E0D7163FE6... Here is timeline for 1913: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1913
